result.title: how to count the "smaller number" in an array
result.content: I want to count for every number ,say A[i] ,how many numbers there are that is smaller than Ai with id smaller than i. For example , here is an array: 5 3 7 2 9 6 ,the anwser is 0 0 2 0 4 3 Is there any fast algorithm that can solve this problem? Thank you for your help!
